title: I'll make you a short story
body: To practice my shitty storytelling, I'm gonna do short stories about almost anything that's legal (pls no lolicon stories or weird shit like that). State your request, and I shall try my best. Be it a small LoL fanfiction, a story that's about some theme (sadness, war, etc.), or even a completely original idea, I shall try my best. So, GD, what kind of story you want?
